column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A man drove into a dividing barrier at 3:30 AM on Sunday
column5: 2020 in front of the General Department of Mineral Resources along the road. Russian Federation in Sangkat Ka Kap I
column6: Khan Por Sen Chey.------According to security guards near the scene
column7: a was Highlander driving along Russian Federation Road from east to west quickly
column8: with a male behind the wheel busy talking on the phone when it went off course and smashed the concrete. The car was damaged
column9: but no one was injured in the accident. The man then left the scene.------After the incident
column10: authorities came down to measure and lift the vehicle and stored it at the Land Traffic Office of the Phnom Penh Municipal Police Commissioner
column11: waiting for the matter to be resolved later. ------RASMEI
